definitions.definition: In mammals , the serous membrane lining the cavity of the abdomen and that is folded over the viscera .
In animals , the membrane lining the coelom cavity.

main_definition: ( anatomy ) In mammals , the serous membrane lining the cavity of the abdomen and that is folded over the viscera .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) In animals , the membrane lining the coelom cavity.
